post.body: - that social media etiquette link doesn't work - repost?
I'm sure there will be a lot of lobbying to get you invited to the next eLeadership meeting in Basel, n'est-ce pas, @cofoman?
is now called "kZiiiZZZ". Trust me, the oracle of Babylon told me!
@bradatpharma @christianhauck - what is the recommended use for the #iwork@novartis hashtag in your opinion?
Right you are!
Luddites, I'm sure
- thanks for the pro7 link
@christianhauck @bradatpharma I might organize a quick TC late afternoon (europe time) to update you; you around?
@christianhauck @bradatpharma I had a good discussion over lunch
actually 4 courses including dessert, and I got them all - but the second one was delayed
It would be great if we could add notes to cli.gs - makes it easier to manage stats for the same link sent via various channels
@dianagib: soon!
because there is the assumption that there is an increased risk. oh, and it's on the roadmap anyway.
Firefox does the trick
Been there twice, will go again. I've got an island-shaped hole in my heart.
@cofoman @christianhauck - some Hawaii pictures from my scan session: http://cli.gs/arDbMN (sorry, Facebook friends only)
whooo, many people I guess? or has the recession arrived in Basel?
nice to meet you again today!
Don't worry, next time we'll let you know in time
- welcome to Twitter! @cofoman @christianhauck - say hi to Diana folks!
@christianhauck i definitely want to organize one!
Waiting for my boss to return from her CEO meeting... hopefully it's just a matter of entering some data & printing...
yes, stuff freezes before it hits the ground... like soap bubbles: http://cli.gs/zP4qZV
Intrablog post suggestion - differences between podcasts and blog posts (from a creator's perspective)
@dockane: did I share my whitepaper with you ("why HR should care about social media")? http://cli.gs/ngQgbd
you're right... but at least I've got an excuse if I don't pay attention today :-)
no, but I guess the brand value of birds has gone up as well!
"My head is like one more salad?"
why, are you in the office?
häxehüsli means "little witch house" and is the cutest little restaurant around Basel: http://cli.gs/Be9AHb
aha - no, I don't think they exist. The Swiss equivalent would be "Klarsichtmappen", i.e. plastic see-through folders.
we call them "interne umschläge" (internal envelopes)
they do, we use them in our office #iwork@novartis
agree, great service on the train, excellent green tea
yes, 16th floor brunch, was cozy
dammit, this Friday's Pecha-Kucha night in Bern is cancelled... :-( ...will I ever see one? http://cli.gs/YEZRBY
wanted to go to the gym this morning. Wanted.
Listening to: The Beauty Of Gemina - One Step To Heaven http://tinyurl.com/6nwwzw
- news for Novartians: http://cli.gs/5SApqJ #iwork@novartis
My whitepaper "Why HR Should Care about Social Media" is out: http://cli.gs/02EEA8
didn't drink any alcohol last night... but his colleagues did... :-)
: What if Darth Vader's rasping breath come from a hookah built into his suit? o_0
oooh, new and improved #googlereader !
: This rocks - my wife (@malaidoskop) bought us the following X-Mas CD: http://cli.gs/4XjJu0
After 0930 pm and some spicy food, the compensation crew takes out their ipods and play ac/dc songs
just got invited to something big
: oops, forgot my office shoes at home... will my snow-friendly construction worker shoes match my suit? http://cli.gs/71YX9v
: Yes I can bike to work in this weather. It's just slow.
will go to sleep now.
bought a new graphics card.
: Social Media Enthusiasts coffee, now.
: Updating my Nokia N96 firmware via PC: 60+ minutes (aborted). Updating over the air: 5 minutes.
is on his way home through the snowy suburbs
off to Ettingen for a dinner, tram is crowded
can go home now. Finally.
: In this fog, the campus looks like Silent Hill...
: minus 60°C in Siberia! SIXTY!
: Alka Seltzer + Water + Microgravity = Fun! http://cli.gs/DUurtp
is sick but in the office, because of deadlines... :-(
is having a lazy Sunday
: Back from the party; music got too loud to have a decent conversation
: chili con carne, nom
finally found the venue and is now having a good time
wrapped a present for tonight's birthday party (in France, great food to be expected)
: Whoo, new Wordpress version 2.7, nice design! http://cli.gs/Jm5U9N
Listening to: Boa - Duvet http://foxytunes.com/artist/boa/track/duvet
: More origami madness... at half past midnight.
: Twitpic chopped up my message: Back from Häxehüsli - pic of the garden lights: http://twitpic.com/vdku
On our way to häxehüsli in the woods of reinach
: "Blaming experts for being wrong is like complaining that the economy is not yellow." http://cli.gs/PHYJJy (via the OverComing Bias blog)
: The Milgram experiment replicated: Still the same results as in the 50s. Shocking, literally. http://cli.gs/BHpdL4
: Is haunted by Nancy Sinatra.
organizing a late breakfast for the few people on our office floor today
Octopusses prefer HDTV: http://cli.gs/WRXbDB
: "I'm waiting for this train to come / could be an hour or maybe some" - Sam Brown
: Sorting videos and listening to James Bond soundtracks.
got some xmas spirit help from @cofoman, turned on the candles, and is eating roasted clove apple made by @malaidoskop. Nom.
thinks watching WWII documentaries does not help getting into holiday spirit... maybe Harry Potter can help?
is finished with his origami... for today. Two more to go for the advent calendar. (it's just in time production)
is folding origami
